Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Aforethought \A*fore"thought`\, a. Premeditated; prepense; previously in mind; designed; as, malice aforethought, which is required to constitute murder. --Bouvier. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: aforethought adj : planned in advance; "with malice aforethought" [syn: {aforethought(ip)}, {planned}, {plotted}]
